summary: MAJOR MILESTONE: Successfully created complete MikeCareer project with 27 memory entries, full documentation, and integrated into knowledge system
details: Completed comprehensive MikeCareer project setup including: 27 properly formatted memory entries covering 24+ years of career history, complete project registry and master index integration, project memory file with narrative context, folder structure with data/documents/working/archive directories, roles_timeline.json with 7 major roles, project README with objectives and resources. Business entity confirmed as Jones Collaboration Company. All entries follow naming conventions (PascalCase for MikeCareer project, snake_case for mike_career tags). Project now fully integrated and searchable across all AI systems. Ready for LinkedIn integration, website creation, and consulting materials generation.
